TunableList.name: _elements
TunableList.description: The list of elements in the dynamic enumeration.

TunableList.name: RelationshipSetupMap
TunableList.description: A mapping of the possible genealogy links in a family to the default relationship values that we want to start our household members.

TunableList.name: Default Relationship Setup
TunableList.description: A list of relationship actions to apply.

TunableTuple.description: An entry in this tested list.

TunableTuple.name: item
TunableTuple.description: A tuning structure that represents a collection of default relationship settings that can be applied to sims in a household.

Tunable.name: _apply_in_both_directions
Tunable.description: If enabled, will apply these defaults to both sims in the relationship. Enable this if you have unidirectional bits or tracks that need to show up on both sims.

TunableList.name: _loots
TunableList.description: A list of loot actions that will be applied to the actor and target sim, after everything else is applied. If 'apply in both directions' is checked, all loots will be applied to actor, and then all loots will be applied to target.

Tunable.description: A loot to apply to the actor and target sim.

TunableList.name: random_relationship_bits
TunableList.description: A list of random relationship bits that can be applied.
A list of relationship bits and weights that that relationship bit can be chosen to add.

TunableTuple.description: A number of weighted relationship bits that have a chance of being applied.

TunableTuple.name: weight
TunableTuple.description: A tunable list of tests and multipliers to apply to the weight of this relationship bit being applied.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

TunableList.name: relationship_bits
TunableList.description: A set of untracked relationship bits that are applied to the relationship between the two sims. These are bits that are provided outside of the relationship_track being set. E.g. everyone in the household should have the Has Met bit and the spouse should have the First Kiss bit.

TunableList.name: relationship_tracks
TunableList.description: A list of relationship track and value pairs. E.g. a spouse has Romantic relationship track value of 75.

Tunable.name: track
Tunable.description: The relationship track that is added to the relationship between the two sims.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The relationship track is set to this value.

Tunable.name: stop_processing
Tunable.description: If checked, no other element from this list is considered if this element passes its associated test.

TdescFragTag.name: test
TdescFragTag.description: A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet. ORs of ANDs

TunableEnum.name: Family Link
TunableEnum.description: A genealogy link between the two Sims in the household.

TunableList.name: SPECIES_TO_FAMILY_MEMBER_LINK
TunableList.description: Define what the 'family member' relationship, i.e. two Sims related by blood or marriage within the same household translates to. For instance, humans would use the regular 'FamilyMember' link, but dogs would use a dog specific link. It's assumed that the two sims involved are the same species.

TunableTuple.description: An entry that defines the 'family member' mapping for two Sims.

TunableEnum.name: genealogy_link
TunableEnum.description: The default genealogy link to create between two Sims of the specified species.

TunableEnum.name: species
TunableEnum.description: The species of the family members.

TunableList.name: SPECIES_TO_ROOMATE_LINK
TunableList.description: Define what the 'roommate' relationship, i.e. two Sims unrelated by blood or marriage within the same household translates to. For instance, two humans would use the regular 'Roommate' link, but a human and a dog would use an 'owner/pet' link.

TunableTuple.description: An entry that defines the 'roommate' mapping for two Sims.

TunableEnum.name: genealogy_link
TunableEnum.description: The default genealogy link to create between two Sims of the specified species.

TunableEnum.name: species_actor
TunableEnum.description: The species of the actor Sim, i.e. the Sim that is going to own any applied bits.

TunableEnum.name: species_target
TunableEnum.description: The species of the target Sim, i.e. the Sim that is going to be the target of any bit applied to the actor.
